messages: 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (22:24): c63a5cfce0a1819ebbe4a19e074356b6: The grouping doesn't actually *do* anything.  I don't know why it exists, but it's meaningless, since they're all using the | separator.
c63a5cfce0a1819ebbe4a19e074356b6 (22:25): 1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb: I see, thanks letting me know

1f8387eb43f131d7c309a90a4e36b5cb (22:27): c63a5cfce0a1819ebbe4a19e074356b6: No problem. All of the grammar combinators like that are associative, so grouping only has an effect when you're mixing combinators.
c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (22:38): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: so, ContentType is always added to the list of custom headers

c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (22:39): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: but the server still doesn't need to send "Content-Type" in ac-response-headers if the value is "text/plain" "multipart/form-data" etc, right?
c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (22:39): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: nor do we pre-flight if it's one of those values, right?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:39): correct
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:40): the only requirement that changed is that the server needs to set Content-Type if it wants to handle it
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:40): in so far you can make server requirements
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:41): it's more advice I guess
3b630800966be5c4f7eb283c363eb7f4 (22:42): AryehGregor: ping
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:46): c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059: I don't think we want to change any UA requirements in the spec
69b0d3dfe919a6b860a9fac82de52a7e (22:54): MikeSmith: i'm not going to touch the bugs that aren't assigned to me (counting contributor@ bugs as being mine)
2cdd7064b290132617248dbfd85f740e (22:55): MikeSmith: Lemme know when you are here. got to ask you smthing
c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (22:57): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: what do you mean by "if it wants to handle it"?
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (22:59): the server section is currently written assuming a list of header names
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:00): we could have the weird content-type special case there too
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:00): but currently it's not there
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:01): just read the diff or the section, that's easier prolly :)
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (23:04): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e, web-apps-tracker frontpage seems to be out of date

c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (23:08): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: oh, you're saying that the spec now recommends that if the server want's the client to be able to set "Content-Type", then it should add it to the acah-header. No matter what values it wants to allow
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:09): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81: did source change?

8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (23:09): 6829  [Authors] [Conformance Checkers] [Gecko] [Internet Explorer] [Opera] [Webkit] [Tools] extend timezone format to also allow omitting the colon 2011-11-18 23:22
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (23:09): Is the newest I get
c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (23:10): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: hmm.. we should probably add the exception there too
c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059 (23:10): edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e: for people using the spec as documentation. Also so that people don't think they are safe if they don't add it
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:11): feel free to suggest a rewrite
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:12): few people did give feedback on that section
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:12): so I guess it's of use to some
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:12): but I don't really like it
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:13): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81: no idea what that can be
8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81 (23:13): hopes it'll go away on itself, then
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:13): doubt it
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:16): 8b3687499080633e1898fa1dd209ef81: http://svn.whatwg.org/webapps/ says the same as web-apps-tracker
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:18): c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059: also, I think the current text is fine
edb259c0e0038f38bb200bc20c8cbf7e (23:18): c480405f460f7a61964569640a6cd059: it explains the whole thing
